Literature.Title: Morphing of Amphipathic Helices to Explore the Activity and Selectivity of Membranolytic Antimicrobial Peptides.
Literature.Author: Müller AT, Posselt G, Gabernet G, Neuhaus C, Bachler S, Blatter M, Pfeiffer B, Hiss JA, Dittrich PS, Altmann K-H, Wessler S, Schneider G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<=5% Hemolysis=8 µM,Human dermal microvascular endothelial cells HDME:50% Cell death=102 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:50% Cell death=12 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus SH1000(MIC=33µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>19µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>19µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>19µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>19µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=1µM),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=12µM),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 208821(MIC=1µM)
